definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This procedure is performed when the stone deactivation key is pressed</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="get_detransform_key_pressed"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_remove_specific_potion_effect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:CustomMaster</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
